Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.core.EventSource
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerListener, EventListener, ViewListener
public class VirtualView
extends EventSource
implements ViewListener, ControllerListener
Virtual View class, it simulates the View in the Server side and each client has associated an unique instance of this class. The class decides which events need to be send to the client and which to the server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean anotherPlayerInRoomCrashed
    Boolean value, is true when another Player, in the same room of this player, caused the end of the game.
    private ClientHandler client
    Where the socket is handled.
    private Lobby lobby
    Lobby of this server.
    private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean userConnectionAccepted
    AtomicBoolean for the first connection, is true if the connection has been accepted and, after the disconnection, Lobby has to be clean.
    private java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock userConnectionAcceptedLock
    ReentrantLock lock for first connection
    private boolean userInLobbyList
    Boolean value, is true when the Lobby accepted the username and added in the Users List.
    private java.lang.String username
    My username.

      Returns:

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent event)
      Handle the VC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent event, save some data like username and forward the event creating a new CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent event. This method also try to start the PreGame phase after the forwarding of the event.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - Event received from the client.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event)
      Handle the received event from the client and forward it to the controller. If this event is the last of the PreGame, try to start the Game Phase on the server.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - Event received from the client.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_PlayerCommandGameEvent event)
      Handle the received event from the client and forward it to the controller. Try to clean the room after this event to see if the match is ended.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - Event received from the client.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_NewGameResponseEvent event)
      Handle the VC_NewGameResponseEvent event, save some data like username and forward the event creating a new CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent event. This method also try to start the PreGame phase after the forwarding of the event.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - Event received from the client.
